title: Authors and Citation
text: Chandrashekar B (2025). DALY: DALY Dashboard: Infection Burden Analysis (ETC5523). R package version 0.1.0, https://etc5523-2025.github.io/assignment-4-packages--shiny-apps-bhuv-c/.

title: Rpackage
text: DALY package interactive Shiny dashboard packaged ETC5523 – Communicating Data (Monash University). visualises Disability-Adjusted Life Years (DALYs) per 100,000 five healthcare-associated infections, split YLD (Years Lived Disability) YLL (Years Life Lost), across two surveillance studies: German PPS ECDC PPS (EU/EEA).

title: Rpackage
text: clean, tidy dataset infection-burden metrics (Data). fully interactive Shiny app (inst/app) crimson theme. pkgdown site consistent styling documentation. Examples clear data descriptions align ETC5523 rubric.

title: Rpackage
text: dataset (Data) provides DALY estimates per 100,000 population five infection categories, across two study groups two DALY components. bar dashboard shows YLD + YLL contributions total burden infection type, allowing comparisons across studies components. Standard error stacked total (YLD + YLL) used draw uncertainty/error bars. Notes interpretation stacked bars, error bar represents uncertainty total DALY burden (YLD + YLL). side--side bars, component values (YLD vs YLL) shown separately total-SE bar hidden. Source: Zacher, B. et al. (2019). Disease burden healthcare-associated infections Germany. Read paper → https://cwd.numbat.space/assignments/assignment-2-papers/Zacher2019.pdf

title: Rpackage
text: example demonstrates load explore DALY dataset R:
code: library(DALY) library(dplyr)  # View structure str(Data)  # Summarise total DALYs for each infection category Data |>   group_by(category) |>   summarise(     Total_DALY = sum(value),     .groups = "drop"   )

title: Rpackage
text: Launch built-dashboard interactively: Run console app allows : Filter DALY component (YLD vs YLL), Toggle stacked side--side bar display, Display uncertainty/error bars, Download plots PNGs, Explore filter raw data interactively.

title: DALY infection-burden dataset — Data
text: dataset contains Disability-Adjusted Life Years (DALYs) per 100,000 five healthcare-associated infections — HAP, SSI, BSI, UTI, CDI — across two surveillance studies: German PPS ECDC PPS (EU/EEA).

title: DALY infection-burden dataset — Data
text: tibble 20 rows 5 variables: group Surveillance study: "German PPS" "ECDC PPS". category Infection type: HAP, SSI, BSI, UTI, CDI. component DALY component: "YLD" "YLL". value DALYs per 100,000 population. se Standard error total DALY estimate (error bars).

title: DALY infection-burden dataset — Data
text: infection’s burden split : YLD — Years Lived Disability YLL — Years Life Lost

what: Launch the packaged Shiny app — run_app
title: Launch the packaged Shiny app — run_app
text: Opens example DALY dashboard bundled inst/app. Packages needed: shiny (app’s suggested packages).
